DarkHawk/Security Drones:

DarkHAwk roared furious and taking one of his fe=
athers he used it as a Sword yelled At Tucson "Stop to Dance and start to f=
ight!!!"


From: Super Cyclonus 
Sent: Tuesday, February 16, 2010 4:36 PM
T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress


=
  
Scourge quickly began moving his way around the room in search of his il=
lusive quarry. "It would seem that the Autobot has a little skill in evasio=
n." Scourge said under his breath, "But I will still catch him. 

Cyclonus =
nodded from his position near to Hydras. He had his weapon drawn out and at=
 the ready, but so far had no likely target. If he had been aware of Tuscon=
's thought that it was he that controlled this new Rodimus he would have la=
ughed. So far there was only enmity covered by a warrior's respect that sep=
erated the two. Cyclonus had no control over him in the this new Dark Rodim=
us, that privalge went to Hydras and the other Predacons who lived here. 

=
Rodimus continued to follow behind Scourge, his loud foot falls sometimes e=
arning him an annoyed glance from the hunter terminator. Both were ready to=
 fall on thier prey when suddenly . . . 

> He gathers the strength to walk=
 into where he could be seen,
> judging by the heat that lights were giving=
 off, as faint as the
> lights may be. He stands before Cyclonus, and Scour=
ge unarmed,
> yet ready to defend himself if need be.
> 
> " Yes, you do ha=
ve someone here. And that someone is me. I
> don't know if you remember me =
or not, we may not have even met.
> My name is Tucson and I'm proud to say =
that I am a member of the
> Autobot faction." 
> 
> He then senses Rodimus =
not too far away.
> 
> " All right, Rodimus, I have a question for you, and=
 you may answer
> at will. What was the very verse that brought the Matrix =
of Leadership
> to life, thus giving you the power of its spark? I know you=
 know this,
> and right now you may be hating my sorry servos, but I think =
I could
> use a refresher on what it was. Can you tell me?"
> 

Rodimus str=
aighted, he could feel Scourge behind him doing much the same thing. 

"The=
 fool! Scourge said, disappoinment written all over his face as well as cov=
ering his words. "I would have caught him, and now he walksd right into the=
 open?"

Cyclonus also turned to look at the Autbot who stepped from the sh=
adows, even as Darkhawk responded attempted to shoot the Autbot who called =
himself Tuscon. However the Autobot displayed a suprising amount of dexteri=
ty as it not only shot once from his crossbow attempting to knock the weapo=
n from Darkhawk's hand, , but then flipped over and attempted another attac=
k on him. 

As surprised as he was Cyclonus mearly reoriented his weapon on=
 the newly positioned Tuscon as Scourge did much the same thing. 

Rodimus =
looked at Tuscon, no hint of recognition crossing his face as he leveled hi=
s own weapon on him. "The only refresher you are going to get here is a ref=
resher in PAIN!" 

A trio of energy blasts lanced out at Tuscon as Cyclonus=
, Scourge and Dark Rodimus opened fire!

OOC: FYI Scourge's armor makes him=
 generally invisible to sensors, which would include sonar and radar. it al=
so hides his heat personal signature as well. 

Preston
(Cyclonus/Scourge/R=
odimus)
